name: ellipse/dispatcher
description: The Psr-15 middleware dispatcher component of the ellipse framework

suggest.ellipse/middleware-callable: Allows to use callables as middleware
suggest.ellipse/middleware-container: Allows to use class names as middleware
suggest.ellipse/handlers-callable: Allows to use callables as request handlers
suggest.ellipse/handlers-container: Allows to use class names as request handlers
suggest.ellipse/handlers-action: Allows to use action strings as request handlers
